original_text: Wicked people may have lots of money. They may have silver like heaps of sand. They may have more clothes than they could ever wear. Wicked people may have lots of money.
korean_text: 그가 비록 은을 티끌 같이 쌓고 의복을 진흙 같이 준비할지라도

sentences.original_text: Wicked people may have lots of money
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 사람들은 많은 돈을 가질 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They may have silver like heaps of sand
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모래 더미처럼 많은 은을 가질 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They may have more clothes than they could ever wear
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 평생 입을 수 있는 것보다 더 많은 옷을 가질 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Wicked people may have lots of money
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 사람들은 많은 돈을 가질 수 있습니다
